tasks.label: Build OpenGL-avanzado (MSBuild)
tasks.command: for /f "usebackq delims=" %i in (`"%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Microsoft Visual Studio\Installer\vswhere.exe" -latest -requires Microsoft.Component.MSBuild -find MSBuild\**\Bin\MSBuild.exe`) do "%i" OpenGL-basico\OpenGL-basico.vcxproj /t:Build /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform=x64
